summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue Southwest, from West Holden Street on the west to West Othello Street; by constructing sewers together with necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8502 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
